DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study obtain experience use fondaparinux ( Arixtra ) compare heparin administer patient undergo percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) . PCI mechanical procedure use widen narrow coronary artery patient symptomatic coronary artery disease . Fondaparinux heparin drug inhibit blood clotting .
DOC.brief_title: A Safety Efficacy Trial Evaluating Use Fondaparinux Percutaneous Coronary Intervention ( PCI ) ( 63133 ) ( WITHDRAWN )
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion Scheduled PCI , include PCI nonST elevation acute coronary syndrome ( ACS ) , primary PCI ST elevation myocardial infarction ( MI ) elective PCI ( plan overnight stay hospital ) . ( Patients undergo diagnostic heart catherization suitable candidate `` ad hoc '' PCI also eligible ) . Exclusion criterion : Age < 21 year Activated Clotting Time ( ACT ) > 200 second immediately prior PCI Use low molecular weight heparin ( LMWH ) previous 6 hour PCI Currently receive oral anticoagulant ( OAC ) agent INR > 1.8 Thrombolytic therapy ST elevation MI previous 24 hour PCI Active internal bleeding history hemorrhagic diathesis Thrombocytopenia ( platelet count < 100 x 109/L ) Pregnant woman woman childbearing potential use effective method contraception Known allergy unfractionated heparin , fondaparinux , aspirin clopidogrel Absolute contraindication anticoagulation Participation clinical research study involve evaluation investigational drug device within 30 day enrollment prior participation study .
